briefdescription.para: Layered framework for authoring, loading, optimizing and playing back animations.

detaileddescription.para: Layered framework for authoring, loading, optimizing and playing back animations

Sorry, this page is yet to be written. Please see the Animation namespace, especially documentation of the lowest-level Animation::interpolate() function, the higher-level Animation::Track class and the top-level Animation::Player API. The transformations-interpolation documentation lists all available builtin interpolation methods.

simplesect.para: This functionality is still experimental and may change in the future without keeping full backwards compatibility.

xrefdescription.para: bottom-up description (interpolating values, keyframes, storing, at(), player, callbacks)
perf optimizations (shortest path, preprocessing..., extrapolation, ...), batchplayer
